00094 /* Runs SExtractor on the image and compute the seeing from
00095 SExtractor Catalog. See belows for details according 
00096 to the options.
00097 argument (argument value in  MakeCatalog()): 
00098 overwrite(false): 
00099   - if = false: if the catalog already exists, then exit 
00100 immediately. 
00101   - if = true: any existing catalog is overwritten.
00102 
00103 savemasksat (true): 
00104   - if = true: the SExtractor computed  saturated pixels 
00105 map is saved.
00106 
00107 pas_sub_fond(false): 
00108   - if = true: the SExtractor computed background map 
00109 won't be subtracted from the image. 
00110   - if = false: the SExtractor computed background 
00111 will be subtracted, providing this hasn't already been 
00112 done (this is tracked with BackSub())
00113 use_sigma_header (false): 
00114   - if = true:  SExtractor will use the SigmaBackground() 
00115 to set his detection and photometric  levels. 
00116 Usefull in case of artificially smoothed images 
00117 (geometrically transformed images, convolved images).*/
00118 
00119   bool MakeCatalog(bool redo_from_beg, bool overwrite, bool savemasksat,
00120                    bool pas_sub_fond, 
00121                    bool use_sigma_header);
00122 
00123 
00125   virtual bool MakeCatalog();
00126 
00127   
00129   bool MakeCatalog_ImageBizarre(){ 
00130     return MakeCatalog(/*redo_from_beg=*/false, /*overwrite = */ true,
00131                        /*savemasksat = */ false, 
00132                        /*pas_sub_fond= */true,
00133                        /*use_sigma_header = */ true);};

00431 /***************** ReducedImageList *************************/
00432 
00433 #include "imagelist.h"
00434 
00435 class ReducedImageList : public ImageList<ReducedImage> {
00436 public :
00437   ReducedImageList(const StringList &Names)
00438   {
00439     for (StringCIterator i=Names.begin(); i != Names.end(); ++i)
00440       push_back(new ReducedImage(*i));
00441   }
00442   ReducedImageList(const bool ShouldDelete = true) 
00443     : ImageList<ReducedImage>(ShouldDelete) {};
00444 };
00445 
00446 typedef ReducedImageList::iterator       ReducedImageIterator;
00447 typedef ReducedImageList::const_iterator ReducedImageCIterator;
